FooterComp.descriptApp: Your trusted partner for fast, secure, and reliable delivery services.

IndexPage.pageDescription: Join SyncPOD and start earning on your own terms. Your City, Your Schedule.
IndexPage.heroSubtitle: SyncPOD connects you with local delivery opportunities. Work when you want, where you want, and take control.
IndexPage.service1_description: We guarantee same-day delivery for all local packages. Our efficient logistics network ensures your package reaches its destination on time.
IndexPage.service2_description: Your packages are handled with the utmost care. We provide secure packaging options to protect your items during transit.
IndexPage.service3_description: Our smart algorithm finds the most efficient route, saving you time and fuel on every delivery.
IndexPage.testimonial1_text: "Fast & Secure Delivery is the best! I was impressed with the speed and professionalism of their service. Highly recommended!"
IndexPage.testimonial2_text: "I've been using their service for my business, and they have never disappointed. Reliable, secure, and always on time."

AboutPage.pageDescription: Learn more about Syncpod app and our mission to revolutionize the logistics industry.
AboutPage.appPreviewSubtitle: Experience the power of seamless logistics management with our intuitive and powerful app.
AboutPage.missionContent: To provide the fastest, most reliable delivery service, connecting people and businesses with what they need, when they need it.
AboutPage.step1_description: Get the Syncpod app from the App Store or Google Play.
AboutPage.step2_description: Create your account to access all features.
AboutPage.step3_description: Use the in-app scanner to add your packages.
AboutPage.step4_description: Let our smart algorithm find the most efficient route.

TermsPage.term1_content: These Terms and Conditions govern your use of the Syncpod app delivery platform. The Syncpod app is an independent application providing delivery services. By using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
TermsPage.term2_content: The Services constitute a technology platform that enables users of the Syncpod app's mobile applications or websites to arrange and schedule transportation and/or logistics services provided by the Syncpod app. The Syncpod app provides transportation and logistics services and functions as a transportation carrier.
TermsPage.term3_content: To use most aspects of the Services, you must register for and maintain an active personal user Services account. You must be at least 18 years of age to obtain an Account. You agree to maintain accurate, complete, and up-to-date information in your Account.
TermsPage.term4_content: You are prohibited from shipping any items that are illegal, hazardous, or dangerous. This includes, but is not limited to, explosives, gases, flammable liquids, and toxic substances. For a full list of prohibited items, please refer to the guidelines provided by the Syncpod app.
TermsPage.term5_content: The Syncpod app is not liable for any damages, liability or losses arising out of your use of the services or your reliance on the services or your inability to access or use the services. The services are provided 'as is' and 'as available.'.
TermsPage.term6_content: The Services and all rights therein are and shall remain the Syncpod app's property. Neither these Terms nor your use of the Services convey or grant to you any rights in or related to the Services except for the limited license granted above.
TermsPage.term7_content: Claims of copyright infringement should be sent to the Syncpod app's designated agent. Please visit the Syncpod app's web page at https://www.syncpodapp.com/legal for the designated address and additional information.
TermsPage.privacy1_content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create or modify your account, request on-demand services, contact customer support, or otherwise communicate with us. This information may include: name, email, phone number, postal address, profile picture, payment method, items requested (for delivery services), and other information you choose to provide.
TermsPage.privacy2_content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, including to facilitate payments, send receipts, provide products and services you request (and send related information), develop new features, provide customer support to users, develop safety features, authenticate users, and send product updates and administrative messages.
TermsPage.privacy3_content: Your personal data is important to us. We use encryption to protect your data, including your password, which is stored in an encrypted format. We take reasonable measures to help protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration and destruction.
TermsPage.privacy4_content: You have the right to delete your account at any time. If you choose to delete your account, we will delete all of your personal information from our systems. You can request to delete your account by contacting our customer support team.
TermsPage.compliance1_content: The Syncpod app is designed to be compliant with the guidelines of the app stores where it is distributed, including the Apple App Store and Google Play Store.
TermsPage.compliance2_content: All in-app purchases are processed through the respective app store's payment system. The Syncpod app does not collect or store your payment information directly.
TermsPage.compliance3_content: Users are expected to adhere to the content and conduct policies of the app stores. Any user-generated content that violates these policies may be removed, and the user's account may be suspended.
TermsPage.compliance4_content: Our privacy practices are designed to be in line with the privacy requirements of the app stores. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for more details.

ContactPage.pageDescription: We are here to help. Find answers to common questions or get in touch with our support team.
ContactPage.heroSubtitle: We are here to help. Find answers to common questions or get in touch with our support team.
ContactPage.faq1_answer: Our platform connects you with a network of reliable couriers. Simply enter your pickup and delivery details, and we'll handle the rest.
ContactPage.faq2_answer: We can deliver a wide range of items, from small documents to large packages. Prohibited items include illegal, hazardous, and dangerous goods.
ContactPage.faq3_question: How many packages you can set up for deliver?
ContactPage.faq3_answer: You can set up multiple deliveries at once through our web or mobile app. For bulk deliveries, we offer specialized business solutions.
ContactPage.faq4_answer: With our app, you can scan your packages in real-time and perform efficient deliveries by following pre-planned routes for each delivery.
ContactPage.contactCardContent: Have a question or need assistance? Email us at
ContactPage.reportCardContent: If you encounter any issues, please report them to
ContactPage.asSoonPossible: , and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
ContactPage.problemList2: The device and browser you are using
